definition: to read through to evaluate/to referee
to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience

sentences.english: Practical training report should be submitted within one week after completion of training instructor approval.
sentences.chinese: 实训报告应在实训完成后一周内交实训指导教师批阅。

sentences.english: The teacher will look over our tests tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 老师明天批阅我们的试卷。

sentences.english: I sign the memorials with a point usually.
sentences.chinese: “朕平时批阅奏章，就是点个点”。

sentences.english: I have checked their papers and many, many of the students did very well.
sentences.chinese: 我已经批阅了他们的试卷，很多同学都做得很好。

sentences.english: This machine can grade examination papers.
The west chamber was the place where the emperor read report, signed documents and discussed military and political affairs with his officials.
sentences.chinese: 西殿是皇帝批阅公文及与官员们商议军政大事的地方。

sentences.english: I will read and comment upon your essays each week.
sentences.chinese: 每一周我会批阅你的文章。

sentences.english: You don't even have to sit at your desk.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至不要坐在书桌上批阅论文。

sentences.english: Ensure that documents for approval by the Financial controller and Finance manager are complete before presentation.
sentences.chinese: 确保财务总监和财务经理批阅的文件及时发送出去。

sentences.english: Having marked the exams most students did well.
sentences.chinese: 批阅完试卷后，大多数同学的成绩都很好。

sentences.english: Our teacher must be correcting our exam papers.
sentences.chinese: 我们的老师一定是在批阅我们的试卷。

sentences.english: I didn't enjoy marking these papers and I was glad to be rid of them.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢批阅这些文件，并很高兴摆脱他们。

definition: to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
memorial to the emperor (folded in accordion form)
memorial to the emperor (folded in accordion form)
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
to write at a tremendous speed
to bend over one's desk (writing, studying, taking a nap etc)
